## LBS Blockchain Association Kick-off: Sign-Ups Open! 

**Time: Tuesday, Nov. 30 @ 7:15 PM** 
[Sign-up Link](https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/lbs-blockchain-association-2021-kick-off-tickets-211665877337)

Are you interested in learning more about Blockchain or Crypto? Or considering a career in Web 3.0? Look no further âœ¨

The LBS Blockchain Association aims to make blockchain and crypto accessible to all. We've got a great roster of events & initiatives on deck for the year and are looking to build out the team behind it! 

Come learn more about what we do & the roles we're looking to fill. 

Note - you don't need to be a blockchain superstar to join us, blockchain newbies are very welcome.

**Presentation will be followed by drinks at the Windsor!**

## Upcoming Events

Our Events team will cover the following topics this academic year. Details TBA

### 1. Blockchain 101 


An introduction to bitcoin, ethereum and the technology underpinning them.



### 2. Smart Contracts and DApps


Learn about the power of smart contracts and the decentralized applications they enable.



### 3. Web 3.0


From the internet of user generated content (Web 2.0), to the internet of value (web 3.0). Where do we go from here?


### 4. NFTs


Learn more about Non-Fungible-Tokens in our dedicated workshop series.

### 5. DAOs


Learn more about the new way of collaborating through decentralized autonomous organisations. 



Follow us on our social media to stay up to date with our events...
